attributes.description: This dashboard provides expanded alerts overview for Azure cloud
attributes.title: [Filebeat Azure] Alerts Overview
Subscriptions Filter [Filebeat Azure]
attributes.visState: {"type": "input_control_vis", "title": "Subscriptions Filter [Filebeat Azure]", "params": {"updateFiltersOnChange": true, "controls": [{"fieldName": "azure.subscription_id", "parent": "", "id": "1571250866125", "indexPatternRefName": "control_0_index_pattern", "label": "Subscription ID", "type": "list", "options": {"size": 5, "order": "desc", "dynamicOptions": true, "type": "terms", "multiselect": true}}], "pinFilters": false, "useTimeFilter": false}, "aggs": []}

attributes.title: Alerts Overview [Filebeat Azure]
attributes.visState: {"type": "metrics", "title": "Alerts Overview [Filebeat Azure]", "params": {"time_field": "", "filter": {"query": "event.dataset :\"azure.activitylogs\" and azure.activitylogs.event_category : \"Alert\"", "language": "kuery"}, "default_timefield": "@timestamp", "series": [{"filter": {"query": "azure.activitylogs.result_type: \"Activated\"", "language": "kuery"}, "id": "61ca57f1-469d-11e7-af02-69e470af7417", "fill": 0.5, "line_width": 1, "point_size": 1, "color": "rgba(252,220,0,1)", "axis_position": "right", "separate_axis": 0, "hide_in_legend": 0, "formatter": "number", "chart_type": "line", "split_mode": "filter", "stacked": "none", "metrics": [{"type": "count", "id": "61ca57f2-469d-11e7-af02-69e470af7417"}]}, {"filter": {"query": "azure.activitylogs.result_type: \"Resolved\" or azure.activitylogs.result_type: \"Succeeded\"", "language": "kuery"}, "id": "5a52f170-ec1e-11e9-b6a7-21d19b63822a", "fill": 0.5, "line_width": 1, "point_size": 1, "color": "#68BC00", "axis_position": "right", "separate_axis": 0, "hide_in_legend": 0, "formatter": "number", "chart_type": "line", "split_mode": "filter", "stacked": "none", "metrics": [{"type": "count", "id": "5a52f171-ec1e-11e9-b6a7-21d19b63822a"}]}], "show_legend": 0, "axis_position": "left", "interval": "", "default_index_pattern": "metricbeat-*", "index_pattern": "filebeat-*", "id": "61ca57f0-469d-11e7-af02-69e470af7417", "isModelInvalid": false, "axis_formatter": "number", "show_grid": 1, "axis_scale": "normal", "type": "timeseries"}, "aggs": []}

attributes.title: Alerts Count [Filebeat Azure]
attributes.visState: {"type": "metric", "title": "Alerts Count [Filebeat Azure]", "params": {"metric": {"labels": {"show": true}, "percentageMode": false, "style": {"subText": "", "bgColor": false, "bgFill": "#000", "labelColor": false, "fontSize": 60}, "useRanges": false, "colorsRange": [{"to": 10000, "type": "range", "from": 0}], "colorSchema": "Green to Red", "metricColorMode": "None", "invertColors": false}, "dimensions": {"bucket": {"accessor": 0, "type": "vis_dimension", "format": {"id": "string", "params": {}}}, "metrics": [{"accessor": 1, "type": "vis_dimension", "format": {"id": "number", "params": {}}}]}, "addTooltip": true, "type": "metric", "addLegend": false}, "aggs": [{"enabled": true, "schema": "metric", "id": "1", "params": {"customLabel": "Alerts"}, "type": "count"}, {"enabled": true, "schema": "group", "id": "2", "params": {"filters": [{"label": "Activated", "input": {"query": "azure.activitylogs.result_type : \"Activated\"", "language": "kuery"}}, {"label": "Resolved", "input": {"query": "azure.activitylogs.result_type : \"Resolved\"", "language": "kuery"}}, {"label": "Succeeded", "input": {"query": "azure.activitylogs.result_type : \"Succeeded\"", "language": "kuery"}}]}, "type": "filters"}]}

attributes.title: Alerts Heatmap [Filebeat Azure]
attributes.visState: {"type": "heatmap", "title": "Alerts Heatmap [Filebeat Azure]", "params": {"addTooltip": true, "colorSchema": "Greens", "type": "heatmap", "percentageMode": false, "dimensions": {"x": {"aggType": "terms", "accessor": 0, "params": {}, "format": {"id": "terms", "params": {"otherBucketLabel": "Other", "missingBucketLabel": "Missing", "id": "string"}}}, "y": [{"aggType": "count", "accessor": 1, "params": {}, "format": {"id": "number"}}]}, "colorsRange": [], "addLegend": true, "setColorRange": false, "colorsNumber": 4, "enableHover": false, "valueAxes": [{"type": "value", "labels": {"overwriteColor": false, "rotate": 0, "show": false, "color": "black"}, "id": "ValueAxis-1", "scale": {"defaultYExtents": false, "type": "linear"}, "show": false}], "times": [], "legendPosition": "right", "invertColors": false}, "aggs": [{"enabled": true, "schema": "metric", "id": "1", "params": {}, "type": "count"}, {"enabled": true, "schema": "segment", "id": "2", "params": {"order": "desc", "orderBy": "1", "customLabel": "Provider", "otherBucket": false, "missingBucket": false, "otherBucketLabel": "Other", "field": "azure.resource.provider", "size": 5, "missingBucketLabel": "Missing"}, "type": "terms"}, {"enabled": true, "schema": "group", "id": "3", "params": {"order": "desc", "orderBy": "1", "customLabel": "Resource Group", "otherBucket": false, "missingBucket": false, "otherBucketLabel": "Other", "field": "azure.resource.group", "size": 5, "missingBucketLabel": "Missing"}, "type": "terms"}]}
